record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, Senator Salazar and I asked the leadership for 30 minutes this morning to discuss Iraq. I thank the leadership for giving us that time.

I ask unanimous consent that the time be allocated in the following way: 5 minutes each for, first, Senator Pryor, then Senator Bennett, then Senator Casey, then Senator Gregg, then Senator Alexander, and finally Senator Salazar. If the Chair would let each Senator know when 5 minutes has expired, I would appreciate that.

record.chair: The Senator from Arkansas is recognized.
